diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Appendicitis with post-operative hemorrhage and compartment syndrome
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with worsening abdominal pain that migrated to the right lower quadrant, along with a history of possible anticoagulation complications (INR of 8), which indicates a high risk for hemorrhage. The procedural intervention of exploratory laparotomy and control of hemorrhage supports the final diagnosis of appendicitis and associated complications.
